title: Former Malaysian PM Mahathir joins little-known party Putra | The Straits Times
snippet: Former Malaysian prime minister Mahathir Mohamad has joined little-known Parti Bumiputera Perkasa Malaysia (Putra).

title: Dr Mahathir receives invitation to join Putra as adviser
snippet: Dr Mahathir Mohamad is seriously considering an invitation by Parti Bumiputera Perkasa Malaysia (Putra) to join the party as an adviser.

title: Dr Mahathir, 13 former Pejuang members join Putra | Malay Mail
snippet: ... KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 25 — Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad has joined Parti Bumiputera Perkasa Malaysia (Putra), former Pejuang Tanah Air (Pejuang) central executive committee member Armin Banian Pahamin said.

title: BERNAMA - Dr Mahathir receives invitation to join Putra as adviser
snippet: According to Dr Mahathir, Putra president Datuk Ibrahim Ali made the offer to join the four-year-old party after the party’s Supreme Council decided on the matter at its meeting today. “So far, I do not see a reason why I should not accept the invitation, but I also always give myself time to think seriously when I have to make decisions. “The offer to join Putra goes well with my (political) struggles.

title: Mahathir Mohamad Fast Facts | KRDO
snippet: He became the oldest elected world leader at 92 when he was sworn into office as prime minister of Malaysia in 2018, a decade-and-a-half after retirement. Mahathir was also prime minister of Malaysia from July 1981 to October 2003.
